item.title: Make your TV a little smarter with a Raspberry Pi
item.description:
I got a Raspberry Pi 4 recently with the end goal of being able to use a browser, Spotify, stream Netflix, YouTube, and from my Jellyfin server.
So here is how I did it.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello and welcome to my blog! I’m Spyros and this is the place where I write about my ideas and my projects, or about anything else I want to. What’s the point of having a blog if you can’t write whatever you want in it, right? I like linux and programing so most if not all of my posts will be related to one of these two. I support free and open source software, thus all my projects are open source and you can find them in my github.
